My Internet Corner

yo

British Columbia

2021

Work took me to the beautiful province of British Columbia in the summer of 2021. Having grown up in Canada, I had never set foot on the west coast. The dramatic landscapes and scenery were quite different from that of home in the shield. From snow-capped mountains to the open ocean, this province definitely knew what to bring. Here are some snippets from my time in British Columbia.

Somewhere over the rainbow a family affair Gracie in the Squamish River Overlooking the Chief Bouldering exercises in Squamish Early morning drives in Garibaldi Lounging in the city Suburban Enchantment In the open sea Colourful lamenting Dana-Kaye and Gracie seafront edition My calves are dying, but at least the view is pretty Green Leaf Cafe special Elfin Lakes Hike Twilight in Vancouver Susan Eyes and Community Gardens
